title: Amrita Garden
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Japanese, Macrobiotic, Organic, Take-out
description: Lunch room, coffee place, and retail space in an old Thai wooden house. Offers a daily macrobiotic lunch which includes organic brown rice, veggie plate, detox soup, papaya leaf tea. Most of the food is vegan, but some desserts contain dairy and/or honey. Has gluten free including muffin and pasta.
